verses.name: Luke 22:46
verses.text: And said unto them, Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.

verses.name: Luke 22:47
verses.text: And while he yet spake, behold a multitude, and he that was called Judas, one of the twelve, went before them, and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him.

verses.name: Luke 22:48
verses.text: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?

verses.name: Luke 22:49
verses.text: When they which were about him saw what would follow, they said unto him, Lord, shall we smite with the sword?

verses.name: Luke 22:50
verses.text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest, and cut off his right ear.
